name: The Backrooms 1.7 scartch.exe
description:
-------------------------------STORY-------------------------------- 

welcome to Async ! You are Jack Napier, new employee in this great company ! 

your job is to monitor the backrooms because due to a problem with the main door, it can no longer close automatically! never let the entity out because it could represent a danger for you and the world ! 

---------------------------HOW TO PLAY-------------------------- Close the door if you can't see the entity in the monitor,do not leave the door closed for too long as it may malfunction! but, in the event of a problem, reboot the door system using your computer ! click on the taskbar at the bottom of the monitor to access the camera or the door system. And the most important rule, survive !
